resources.string: All the locations that are featured and have the demand in VIT!!
The Mahatma Gandhi Auditorium features a world-class, 2500-fixed-seat auditorium capable of handling a variety of functions from business meetings to large production events.
The Nethaji Auditorium features a world-class, 400-fixed-seat auditorium capable of handling a variety of functions from business meetings to large production events.
The V.O.C Auditorium features a world-class, 150-fixed-seat auditorium capable of handling a variety of functions from business meetings to large production events.
The Conference Room - Academic Block:1 features a world-class, 120-fixed-seat auditorium capable of handling a variety of functions from business meetings to large production events.
The RUBY - Admin Block features a world-class, 50-fixed-seat auditorium capable of handling a variety of functions from business meetings to large production events.
The Smart Classroom features a world-class, 100-fixed-seat auditorium capable of handling a variety of functions from business meetings to large production events.
